description:
After Jayce and Silas's first time, I wanted to put Jayce with someone who would be smooth and confident (rather than two newbies testing the waters), and ease him in to the whole "sex with dudes" thing.
Jayce's biggest hurdle seems to be kissing. It was the one thing we discussed the most as him having issues with. The irony is, he actually didn't have any problems with a dude busting in his mouth, mainly cuz he loves seeing it in the porn he watches. Fortunately we get to see both in this video!
I think Jayce also responds better to guys who take control, and Race has the experience and drive to turn him on.
An insanely easy video to shoot, and both guys clearly got into it. Jayce's cumshot is top notch, as Race fucks him and hits all the right spots. And of course Race returned the favor right in Jayce's mouth!
title: Jayce & Race - Wrapped
